description: All premium upgrades, including Double Cash, Monkey Tycoon, Healthy Bananas, Double Ranga, Crystal Ball, Explosive Darts, Frag Bombs, Digital Amplification, Dreadnaught, and Rank 31. With Rank 31 you will unlock all non-purchasable unlockables such as all tower types and all upgrades for them, all game modes including Sandbox Mode and Apopalypse Mode.
A one-off cash dump of 10,000. Only works in your current game, so spend it wisely.

A simple track with a twist - the bloons criss cross the central path multiple times making it easy to get good value for your towers. However there is limited build area in the upper part of the track and the bloons can come from either entrance!
Crystal Ball is an upgrade for Monkey Wizards. It greatly increases their attack range and allows spotting of Camo bloons.
An easy and fun BTD4 track where the bloons must pass through the central area at least 5 times before heading to the exit.
Provides Monkey Beacons with a massively improved influence radius.

With this perk, you will get 2 money from every bloon popped instead of the normal 1. You will also have a leg up at the start getting 1300 money to begin every game. Once this is purchased you can choose to use it or not at your discretion, just select it in the game options screen before the game starts.
All your Boomerang Throwers become ambidextrous and will throw 2 boomerangs instead of 1!
Enhances the attack of Monkey Buccaneers so that they shoot huge flaming cannon balls instead of darts. This enhanced attack can pop frozen and lead bloons.
Darts from your Dart Monkeys will explode when they reach the end of their maximum pops!
Makes all bombs from Bomb Towers or Missile Towers explode out deadly fragments that can pop extra bloons including bomb immune bloons!
This is a moderately challenging double path track. The bloons on the left most track come from the top of the screen, and for the right track, from the bottom of the screen.
Your Banana Farms become extremely healthy. So healthy in fact that they give you +1 life per upgrade, PER ROUND!

This is an extremely challenging track. Two separate tracks converge then split then converge then split before heading to the exits. Although there is lots of good building area, the tracks are short giving you no room for error.
This track is bizarre and highly challenging. It has 4 separate tracks that start on the top half of the screen then loop once around the centre, finally heading to their respective exits.
Once you learn the ways of the Tycoon, you will be able to sell your towers for 100% of what you paid for them, including all upgrades.
This will give you 200 extra lives in your current game. This only applies to your current game so use it if you are about to lose and want to keep going.
This track is one of the most challenging you can ever play. It has 5 very short separate tracks that combine into one. Good luck, you will need it!
A simple track where bloons can come from either direction. The large area in the centre is a good spot to build most of your towers.

Buying this will set your Rank to 31, or 32 if you are playing BTD4 expansion, awarding you all tower unlocks, level 5 tower upgrade unlocks, and game mode unlocks including Sandbox Mode and Apopalypse Mode, and Deflation Mode in BTD4 Expansion. This content is all normally unlocked by simply playing the game through and getting these unlocks as you Rank up yourself.
Track Pack gives you all 7 purchasable tracks in one go. Buying them in this manner saves you 30 NK Coins!
